Location:
- Exterior HVAC condenser, side/service panel and labels

Observations:
- Gray painted metal cabinet; warning and certification labels legible (Ingersoll Rand)
- Louvered service panel with screws/fasteners in place
- Unit mounted on pad; base pan visible
- Minor cosmetic scuffs/scratches on paint

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- Maintain clearances and keep area free of debris for airflow
- Touch up scratched paint to prevent future corrosion
- Schedule routine HVAC service; verify disconnect, conduit, and refrigerant line conditions during full inspection
